news.title: UK house prices stabilise in January 2023 after four-month fall: Halifax
news.para: Britain's housing market saw a surge in demand from buyers during the coronavirus pandemic but a sharp rise in interest rates over the past year and the squeeze on households' budgets caused by high inflation has hit the momentum.

news.title: Nannambra panchayat urges Life Mission to sanction home
news.para: The panchayat said in the resolution that the three sisters were fully eligible for being granted house under Life Mission but the existing guidelines regarding selection of beneficiaries were coming in the way of the panchayat to provide them a home.

news.title: Oberoi Realty's net profit increases by 50.27% in Q3 FY23
news.para: Oberoi Realty's consolidated total income stood at Rs 1,651.50 crore in Q3 FY23, a growth of 95.17 per cent from Rs 846.19 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Panel set up to decide on fine on firm involved in construction waste 'scam' in Gurugram
news.para: The committee will also evaluate the amount of penalty to be imposed on the firm if they find the firm is liable to be penalised.

news.title: No construction without building plan approval in Ludhiana: Local bodies department
news.para: In the letter addressed to the MC, it has been instructed that notices should be issued in case a building is constructed without a building plan approval.

news.title: Somany Ceramics to invest Rs 62.5 crore to set up manufacturing facility in Nepal
news.para: The joint venture between Somany Ceramics and Murarka Group will operate and manage a tile manufacturing facility with annual capacity of around 3.5 million square meter in Nepal.

news.title: Two more land parcels in Kolkata's Nonadanga on the block
news.para: Hidco is next planning to auction two more land parcels in Nonadanga - a 2.9acre and another 1.7acre plot - in March. Hidco has initiated the process to invite applications for both the plots.

news.title: Odisha high court bid to help buyers get relief for delayed flats
news.para: The high court directive came while hearing a PIL seeking intervention against ORERA's shirking influence on execution of its orders related to disputes over realisation of interest on money deposited in case of delayed delivery in possession and handover of a flat to a consumer.

news.title: Sealing of properties started to recover taxes in Vadodara
news.para: The VMC has become aggressive in tax collection as the financial year is at its fag end. The civic body has set itself a target of recovering Rs 530 crore towards property tax of which Rs 480 crore has been recovered.

news.title: Five town planning schemes may get Maharashtra's nod by April 2023
news.para: The five schemes, requiring 751.55 hectares, will come up in Wadachiwadi, Autade Handewadi, Manjari Kolwadi, and two at Holkarwadi, a Pune Metropolitan Region Development Authority (PMRDA) official said.

news.title: Shree Cements' net profit dips 41.61% in Q3 FY23
news.para: Shree Cements' consolidated total income stood at Rs 4,473.38 crore in Q3 FY23, a growth of 18.94 per cent from Rs 3,760.96 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Mumbai: Bhendi Bazaar redevelopment second phase launched
news.para: Deputy chief minister Devendra Fadnavis, who also holds the housing portfolio, assured his full support to the project and said the state government was 100% with the project proponents and “will ensure there are no interruptions and the project is completed in time”.

news.title: Cabinet discusses jantri rate hike, builders hopeful of cut in Gujarat
news.para: Speaking to reporters after the cabinet meeting, Patel reiterated that all those who registered their properties after February 4 would be required to pay stamp duty and registration fees according to the new jantri rate.

news.title: Maharashtra to build 3.75 lakh houses under PMAY-Urban till December 2024
news.para: These 3.75 lakh units are a part of the 15.82 lakh units sanctioned for the state in 2015, of which 6.93 lakh or 44% have been completed. The earlier deadline to complete the construction of the 2015 target was 2022, which was revised to 2024 in the Centre's bid to offset the impact of Covid-19 pandemic.

news.title: RBI hikes repo rate by 25 basis points to 6.5%
news.para: Announcing the bi-monthly monetary policy, RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das said the Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) by a majority decided to raise the policy repo rate by 25 basis points and keep a 'strong vigil' on inflation outlook.
